projects.title: Multiverse
projects.materials: Text, Twitter. Written in Python and Javascript.

projects.title: Prosaic
projects.description: Programmatically generated from a corpus of 1MM+ common English words and phrases.
projects.materials: Text. Written in Python, using the Natural Language Toolkit.

projects.title: Beluga
projects.description: Programmatically generated creatures promenade across an ocean from dawn to dusk.
projects.materials: Created for the 120-foot long Video Wall @IAC HQ with Processing.
projects.music: Belle nuit, o nuit d'amour from Les Contes DHoffmann.

projects.title: Flur
projects.description: A study of color in motion.
projects.materials: Originally created with Processing. Ported to p5.js.
projects.music: Prelude No. 5 in D Major from the Well-Tempered Clavier by J.S. Bach.

projects.authors: Mimi Yin, Alexx Shilling, Janusz Jaworski
projects.title: RGB Y
projects.description: A structured improvisation that produces a painting.
projects.materials: Powder pigment, pencil shavings, and water on white butcher paper.

projects.title: Hangman's Jig
projects.description: 1 in a series of moving light sculptures.

projects.title: Chance Encounters on The Highline
projects.description: Structured improvisations for video intended for outdoor projection at dusk.
projects.performers: Maddy Bullard, Lulu Soni, and Craig Protzel.

projects.title: Soundwaller
projects.description: Movement detected by a camera scatters notes on an ever-shifting tonal landscape that is always modulating towards the average tonic.

projects.title: Beedoo
projects.materials: Originally created with Processing. Ported to p5.js.
